before.body:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: API to access codingtips application
  version: '1'
  title: CodingTips-java-API
paths:
  "/codingtips":
    get:
      description: "Get coding tips"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "The codingtips request successful."
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/CodingTip"
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        uri: arn:aws:apigateway:eu-west-2:lambda:path/2015-03-31/functions/arn:aws:lambda:eu-west-2:735221941004:function:CodingTips-java-get/invocations
        passthroughBehavior: "when_no_match"
        httpMethod: "POST"
        type: "aws_proxy"
    post:
      description: "Post a codingtip"
      responses:
        '201':
          description: 200 response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/CodingTip"
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        uri: arn:aws:apigateway:eu-west-2:lambda:path/2015-03-31/functions/arn:aws:lambda:eu-west-2:735221941004:function:CodingTips-java-post/invocations
        passthroughBehavior: "when_no_match"
        httpMethod: "POST"
        type: "aws_proxy"
    options:
      description: For CORS support
      responses:
        200:
          description: 200 OK
          headers:
            Access-Control-Allow-Methods:
              schema:
                type: string
            Access-Control-Allow-Headers:
              schema:
                type: string
            Access-Control-Allow-Origin:
              schema:
                type: string
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        responses:
          default:
            statusCode: 200
            responseParameters:
              method.response.header.Access-Control-Allow-Methods: "'GET,OPTIONS'"
              method.response.header.Access-Control-Allow-Headers: "'Content-Type,Authorization,X-Amz-Date,X-Api-Key,X-Amz-Security-Token'"
              method.response.header.Access-Control-Allow-Origin: "'*'"
        passthroughBehavior: when_no_match
        requestTemplates:
          application/json: "{\"statusCode\": 200}"
        type: mock
        contentHandling: CONVERT_TO_TEXT
servers:
  - url: "/"
components:
  schemas:
    CodingTip:
      type: object
      description: "A coding tip"
      properties:
        tip:
          type: string
          description: "The coding tip"
        date:
          type: number
          description: "date in millis when tip was entered"
        author:
          type: string
          description: "Author of the coding tip"
        category:
          type: string
          description: "category of the coding tip"
      required:
        - tip
before.name: CodingTips-java-API

values.template:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: API to access codingtips application
  version: '1'
  title: ${name}
paths:
  "/codingtips":
    get:
      description: "Get coding tips"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "The codingtips request successful."
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/CodingTip"
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        uri: ${get_lambda_arn}
        passthroughBehavior: "when_no_match"
        httpMethod: "POST"
        type: "aws_proxy"
    post:
      description: "Post a codingtip"
      responses:
        '201':
          description: 200 response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/CodingTip"
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        uri: ${post_lambda_arn}
        passthroughBehavior: "when_no_match"
        httpMethod: "POST"
        type: "aws_proxy"
    options:
      description: For CORS support
      responses:
        200:
          description: 200 OK
          headers:
            Access-Control-Allow-Methods:
              schema:
                type: string
            Access-Control-Allow-Headers:
              schema:
                type: string
            Access-Control-Allow-Origin:
              schema:
                type: string
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        responses:
          default:
            statusCode: 200
            responseParameters:
              method.response.header.Access-Control-Allow-Methods: "'GET,OPTIONS'"
              method.response.header.Access-Control-Allow-Headers: "'Content-Type,Authorization,X-Amz-Date,X-Api-Key,X-Amz-Security-Token'"
              method.response.header.Access-Control-Allow-Origin: "'*'"
        passthroughBehavior: when_no_match
        requestTemplates:
          application/json: "{\"statusCode\": 200}"
        type: mock
        contentHandling: CONVERT_TO_TEXT
servers:
  - url: "/"
components:
  schemas:
    CodingTip:
      type: object
      description: "A coding tip"
      properties:
        tip:
          type: string
          description: "The coding tip"
        date:
          type: number
          description: "date in millis when tip was entered"
        author:
          type: string
          description: "Author of the coding tip"
        category:
          type: string
          description: "category of the coding tip"
      required:
        - tip
